ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Update a user
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Update a user
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Update an existing user. Note that you may also supply a `password` property--it will not be returned by any API.
Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Update a user

Update an existing user. Note that you may also supply a `password` property--it will not be returned by any API. Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)

Method: Put

OperationID: updateUser

EndPoint:

/users/{id}
